title: Jordan Peterson in the news a lot again this superbowl weekend
description:
Lots of interesting posts on Peterson from this weekend

https://nypost.com/2018/02/03/a-male-backlash-against-metoo-is-brewing/ 

http://freebeacon.com/culture/review-12-rules-for-life-an-antidote-to-chaos-by-jordan-peterson/ 

https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/resilience-bullying/201802/the-meteoric-rise-professor-jordan-peterson 

https://youtu.be/Hpj06eD9nwM JBP and Newman Mashup

PewDiePie's book reviews. https://youtu.be/oZ_qiYc133U
